root.Summary: 1: Benitez CM, Qu K, Sugiyama T, Pauerstein PT, Liu Y, Tsai J, Gu X, Ghodasara A,Arda HE, Zhang J, Dekker JD, Tucker HO, Chang HY, Kim SK. An integrated cellpurification and genomics strategy reveals multiple regulators of pancreasdevelopment.
